mapper.insert: insert into trade_review values( seq_trade_review_no.nextval, #{productNo}, #{starScore}, #{content}, default, null)
mapper.update: update trade_review set star_score = #{starScore}, content = #{content}, updated_at = sysdate where review_no = #{reviewNo}
mapper.select: select distinct m.nickname, m.profile_img, u.seller_id from used_product u left join member m on(u.seller_id = m.member_id) where u.product_no = #{no}

select t.*, m.nickname, m.profile_img, r.report_no from trade_review t left join used_product u on(t.product_no = u.product_no) left join member m on(u.buyer_id = m.member_id) left join review_report r on(t.review_no = r.review_no) where u.seller_id = #{memberId} order by t.created_at desc
select count(*) from trade_review t left join used_product u on(t.product_no = u.product_no) where u.seller_id = #{memberId}

select round(avg(case when u.seller_id = (select seller_id from used_product where product_no = #{no}) then t.star_score end), 1) star_score_avg, count(case when u.seller_id = (select seller_id from used_product where product_no = #{no}) then 1 end) product_count, count(case when u.seller_id = (select seller_id from used_product where product_no = #{no}) and t.review_no is not null then 1 end) review_count from used_product u left join trade_review t on(u.product_no = t.product_no)
mapper.insert: insert into review_report values( seq_review_report_no.nextval, #{reviewNo}, #{category}, #{content}, default, default)
